name: Icy Wind
description: You create an icy wind that gusts towards a creature in range. Make a ranged attack against a creature, doing 1d8 + MOVE ice damage on a hit. On a natural attack roll of 18 or more, the target falls prone.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
